item.title: Jitsi – Secure, Free Video Conferencing for Learning Teams
item.dc:creator: vijay
item.description:
Jitsi is an open source, feature rich and free video conferencing platform that provides a reliable solution for individuals and organisations looking for a safe and privacy-focused way to connect online. I wrote a detailed post on Jitsi on my blog at https://vjdesign.com.au/jitsi-secure-free-video-conferencing/ Jitsi for trainers/teachers Jitsi is an easy to use tool for teachers, ... Read more

This post first appeared on https://trainwell.com.au/

item.title: SCORM Content fails to load for just one user – Totara LMS
item.dc:creator: vijay
item.description:
A SCORM module that works and has worked without issue for all users for more than a year but only shows a plain white screen (no content loads) for one user. I tried multiple browsers and devices; it only fails to load for the one user. Why did this happen? The user first attempted or ... Read more

This post first appeared on https://trainwell.com.au/

item.title: Seminar Events – Filter by location in Totara LMS
item.dc:creator: vijay
item.description:
Do you need a simple filter to show/hide seminar events from a selected location in Totara LMS? We needed to run multiple events across multiple locations for our courses and we needed to do so across more than 50 different office locations. Since there may be 200 to 300 events every year for each course… ... Read more

This post first appeared on https://trainwell.com.au/

item.title: Styling emails in Moodle & Totara LMS
item.dc:creator: vijay
item.description:
Save yourself the pain of coding your Totara email template from scratch. Brand your emails to look good in email clients like Outlook.

This post first appeared on https://trainwell.com.au/

item.title: Modify the correct language string easily in Totara LMS
item.dc:creator: vijay
item.description:
Use the &strings=1 parameter to show the origin of a language string and filter or find the correct string to modify e.g. 'Other evidence' in Record of Learning

This post first appeared on https://trainwell.com.au/

item.title: How to access the free LinkedIn Learning for libraries?
item.dc:creator: vijay
item.description:
Microsoft LinkedIn Learning (formerly Lynda.com) is my go-to learning resource. It gives you unlimited access to video tutorials on a wide range of topics. Follow the steps below to access LinkedIn Learning for Libraries for free using your library card number and PIN. The numerous business and productivity courses on LinkedIn Learning helped me as ... item.title: Icons in Totara LMS
item.dc:creator: vijay
item.description:
Use the SVG icons already available in Totara LMS rather than adding images. Add them as SPAN tag. Add classes to change icon size and colour.

This post first appeared on https://trainwell.com.au/
